body.name: Cat Kid Comic Club: Influencers: A Graphic Novel (Cat Kid Comic Club #5): From the Creator of Dog Man
editorialReviews: Editorial Reviews Review Praise for Cat Kid Comic Club:★ "Downright moving... it's a heartfelt celebration." -- Publishers Weekly, starred review★ "Colorful, compelling, and laugh-out-loud funny." -- School Library Journal, starred review★ "Deceptively chaotic, devilishly clever... another winner." -- Kirkus Reviews, starred review★ "Wise, funny, and whiplash inducing: Pilkey delivers again." -- Kirkus Reviews, starred review About the Author When Dav Pilkey was a kid, he was diagnosed with ADHD and dyslexia. Dav was so disruptive in class that his teachers made him sit out in the hallway every day. Luckily, Dav loved to draw and make up stories. He spent his time in the hallway creating his own original comic books -- the very first adventures of Dog Man and Captain Underpants. In the second grade, Dav's teacher ripped up his comics and told him he couldn't spend the rest of his life making silly books. Fortunately, Dav was not a very good listener.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 16 hrs 37 mins
body.description: The newest graphic novel in the #1 bestselling series by Dav Pilkey, the author and illustrator of Dog Man!The Cat Kid Comic Club is in crisis! After learning that one of their comics will be published, the baby frogs are filled with anxiety and doubt. How will they get their creative groove back? Will Naomi or Melvin emerge as a leader? Will Flippy convince them to finally straighten up and fly right?The story is hysterical, thought-provoking, and full of action-packed mini-comics: "Frogzilla vs. Mechafrogzilla," "I Am Dr. Fredric Wertham," "Two Birds," and "RoboChubbs." Bestselling author-illustrator Dav Pilkey shows the reader that the best way to influence people is to be open, gentle, and kind. The variety of art styles, paired with Pilkey's trademark storytelling and humor, inspires imagination and innovation for readers of all ages.For more hilarity and heart, dive into the newest graphic novel in the Dog Man series: Dog Man: Twenty Thousand Fleas Under the Sea. And don't forget the series that started it all: Captain Underpants! A new edition of The Adventures of Captain Underpants includes a brand new Dog Man comic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Books I’ve ever read.
reviews.reviewText: I love this book. Dav Pilkey made this book great. 1, I love the “Two Birds” comic and the “Frogzilla v.s. Mecha Frogzilla”. Highly recommended book you should buy and read. I’d give this 999,999,999 stars if I could. BUY THIS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST BOOK EVER
reviews.reviewText: I asked my 11 y.o. son for the review. He said, "I really love this book! It is funny and he really loves it! It is about the Comic Club being shut down and Flippy teaches Naomi how to be an influencer and at the end of the book, they bring the Cat Kid Comic Club back." Thank You Dav Pilkey and Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked all the comics in it and how they illustrated everything I think that kids ages 8 to 10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love Dav Pilkey's books. My daughter became a very good reader thanks to all of his books. We pre-ordered the book and it arrived as soon as it was released. What a wonderful book. It is amazing how easy it is for kids to read, but the concepts in it are deep and make you really think. I just finished reading to my kids the last few chapters and I read the "comic" written by poppy the tadpole, her comic is called two birds and it made me cry and actually reflect on my own behavior and take on life. I tucked my kids in bed, came to my bed to read it again and I am still crying. In a good way, just because sometimes you need a kids comic book to remind you about being kind and what is really important in life. Everyone should read this book, it is my favorite from Dav Pilkey's book; he's a genius that can write about love, and being kind in a way that kids and grownups can enjoy and learn from. Go and please buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best deal ever! I have ordered for my 8 year old boy! As always he enjoys reading Dav Pilkey books.

reviews.reviewText: We love Dave Pilkey. I always preorder his new releases and get them in the mail on release day. I don’t have to go to a store which is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love this series
reviews.reviewText: My 5th and 3rd graders love this series. They were waiting for this book to come out for and they each got one for Christmas. Cute story and easy to read. No crazy content. Very family friendly book.
My son loves these. The Dog Man series is what made him start reading. These are just a continuation of the original Dog Man.

reviews.reviewText: My son has loved this books for a couple of years now and is always so excited when a new one comes out. They’re great books to get kids into reading and are like comics in style.
